name: Heart String
description:
Heart String is a twitchy 2D parkour-style game, where you play as a ninja with a grapling hook.

Heart String was made for the Ludum Dare 46 Game jam with the theme of "Keep It Alive".

The game was created using the Duality2D Game engine.

Graphics : Krita

SFX: BfXR and Audacity

Music: Ableton live 9

Animations: Spriter2D

Levels: Tiled Map Editor

The source code is available at Github.
